website_summaries.verdict: A stunning set that recreates the iconic flying command center. A must for Trekkies.
pros: This 594-piece set intended for ages 14 and up offers endless play possibilities and also looks great on display
Comes with 4 posable action figures, including Captain Kirk and Spock
cons: Expensive and intended more for collectors than as a play set

customer_reviews.title: Buy 1 and build your own partial Enterprise Bridge...or buy 3 and make it complete!
customer_reviews.text: An excellent set for Star Trek Fans of all ages! A very faithful recreation of the bridge set from the original Enterprise that is built in sections and fun to put together. If you buy a few of the other Mega Bloks Star Trek sets you can have the whole cast on board. And if you buy 2 more bridge sets, and do some custom building, you might even end up with a complete Enterprise bridge! If you are a die-hard Trek fan, it is worth the extra expense and effort to build a bridge in all it's 360 degree glory!
customer_reviews.author: Goodwill Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Set
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent set from Mega Bloks. The pictures make it look like it might be just a fragile facade but it is actually quite sturdy as there are a surprising number of bricks used in its construction. The printing (no stickers here) on all of the panels and monitors is fantastic. The figures use the standard Mega Bloks articulation scheme so there are plenty of posing options and they even have quite good likenesses considering the scale. I was afraid I might feel a bit underwhelmed but this set is well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Stack

customer_reviews.title: Great fun!  Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a fan. I'm also a 48 year old female and no I'm not a total nerd, but I have to admit that I actually purchased this and the Transporter set as a little birthday present to myself. It was great fun to put together!
customer_reviews.author: Diane S.Top Contributor: Star Trek

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have for any TOS Fan
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Kit. The instructions are clear and the finished product is pretty cool. The attention to detail is really impressive and the structural design is really quite smart. I think my favorite part is the elevator doors - the mechanism to work them is quite clever. (I just wish there was a turbo lift behind the doors). This kit has very solid construction so you don't have to worry about it not staying together. The characters are great too. Even Nomad is included! Very good quality set. Great for any fan of the original series.
customer_reviews.author: BLaufman

customer_reviews.title: mega bloks star trek bridge kit
customer_reviews.text: lots of fun. this was a present for my boy, he liked it. and i helped him build it! yes it took a little while to build- i think we did it in 3 stages. ok, i 'really' liked it and he did like it also.... but we still had fun making it and thats the point right! positive- constructive -time with your kids!!!!!! i saw a transporter room kit also, i think i'll get that one for my daughter....for christmas..
customer_reviews.author: amaz pennam

customer_reviews.title: Nice set!
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this set is quality. It looks great, and there are a lot of nice details. The printed control panels look fantastic, and I particularly like the paint job on the phasers and tricorder. The working doors for the Turbo Lift is a nice touch. The figures are good likenesses of the TOS crew, and they're extremely pose-able.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wallace

customer_reviews.title: and the special art pieces look like the real thing
customer_reviews.text: This really was surprising at how much it channeled the spirit of Star Trek. Instructions were very detailed, the figures are well-made, the block pieces snapped together snugly, and the special art pieces look like the real thing. I bought it at full price ($59.99) and thought it was worth it; now I'm seeing it for much less so it's a no-brainer for anyone who likes Trek.
customer_reviews.author: Zanzibar

customer_reviews.title: Mega bloks - These are the Voyages!
customer_reviews.text: I this set blew my mind when I saw it. I find this to be the center piece of any collection. I am looking forward in getting the opportunity to put this together as I relive my childhood. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: jatkinson

customer_reviews.title: Mega Bloks precision fit is not as good as Lego
customer_reviews.text: Mega Bloks precision fit is not as good as Lego, however, Lego doesn't do anything Star Trek and I'm a Trekkie to the core. Figures are flexible but very odd looking, almost grotesque, but grow on you, especially in the classic episode / movie costumes.
customer_reviews.author: Prime-A-Holic

customer_reviews.title: Well done
customer_reviews.text: This set is fantastic. Amazing details and an easy build. Hopefully we will continue to see future Star Trek sets in the future. If you are a fan of either Star Trek or building sets, you can't go wrong here.
customer_reviews.author: Dev71

customer_reviews.title: Nicer than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Looks like the “real” thing. My son loves it, and now I want one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: DAK

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Star Trek block building set!
customer_reviews.text: I was amazed how this set mimics the Star Trek bridge. I would recommend to anyone who appreciates Lego or Lego-like kits and is a Star Trek fan.
customer_reviews.author: emeraldcrusader

customer_reviews.title: It was a gift and I love it.
customer_reviews.text: They really captured the feel and spirit of Star Trek TOS in this set. It's very cool.
customer_reviews.author: Chrirule

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The birthday boy really enjoys having his toys...even though he is a grown man :)
customer_reviews.author: LKC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great building set, possible for expansion to a full bridge layout
customer_reviews.author: michael revilla

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: What an amazing product! Easy to put together and so pleasing to look at. Well worth investing in. The detail is amazing and poseable mini figures is such a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: MR MJS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: génial du vrai star trek pas la copie de 2009
customer_reviews.author: startrek

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME!!!!! I hope they make a second wave of classic star trek sets.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Entertaining Review, Unboxing and Display with Effects (at end)
customer_reviews.text: Covered pretty much everything in the video review. Comments, criticism, questions welcome!
customer_reviews.author: ChewyBricks

customer_reviews.title: Great item for architects no labelling on the part bags is shameful
customer_reviews.text: First off none of the bags of parts have any labeling making it too hard to put together, I gave up. But the finished item looks awsome
customer_reviews.author: tim burgess

customer_reviews.title: Fun Building Set
customer_reviews.text: I love these Mega Bloks sets. I had previously built a larger Mr. Spock with my daughter, and we decided tackle the larger project of the Enterprise Bridge. There are a lot of pieces, and it'll take us a few Sunday afternoons to finish, but it's a great opportunity to bridge our generations and interests (sorry for the pun). The pieces are very, very small in some cases, so be careful around younger children or pets. The instructions are easy to follow, and I'm excited for when the whole thing is done. The only odd thing about this is that it came with two Uhura figures. All others were included, we just got an extra one too.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Fun, Easy, and Detailed!
customer_reviews.text: This Mega Bloks set was a huge hit in our house. My sci-fi nerds (husband and tween) built this together and gave me their thoughts on it. They liked the easy to follow directions and neatly packaged bags of blocks. The action figures of Kirk, Sulu, Spock, and Ohura were definitely their favorite over a Lego figure. The scene was nicely detailed and the set was easy to put together and play with. They thoroughly enjoyed the time together and the finished product looks great on a shelf in the movie room. It's a great alternative to the more expensive Lego brand.
customer_reviews.author: TheProf

customer_reviews.title: High-quality, lovely Classic Trek collectible and toy
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, large and surprisingly accurate representation of the bridge of the original Enterprise. Love the cool and caricatured stylings of the characters; just wish it was easier to buy more figures individually to fill out the crew. Better quality than the KRE-O sets from a few years ago. It's expansive, nearly 600 pieces, but even as an adult, I had a great deal of fun putting it together. No frustration, just felt like putting together the world's coolest puzzle. Highly recommended for any Classic Trek fan, young or old.
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT W. SAINT JOHN

customer_reviews.title: and these weren't quite as good, but honestly
customer_reviews.text: My middle name is Kirk after Captain Kirk, so I kind of had to get this when it was a vine option. I've always played with Legos, and these weren't quite as good, but honestly, they're pretty much identical. I don't know exactly why the many bags the pieces came in were sorted the way they were, but it was easy enough, with like-color things usually in the same bags. Instructions were perfectly cromulent. Building it was a blast! And now I have the Enterprise Bridge to show off! What's not to love? Definitely worth doing if you love Star Trek and Legos/Mega Bloks!
customer_reviews.author: Dipped in Ink

customer_reviews.title: I love this set
customer_reviews.text: As a Star Trek fan and collector, I love this set. The characters are more like action figures than block-looking (Kirk, Spock, Sulu, and Uhura). The block pieces that make up the bridge set come in a variety of sizes, are fairly sturdy, and have great detail. The pictures don't do it justice. There's a lot more to it than it looks. It's easy to assemble and looks great. It took just a little while to assemble, maybe just over an hour because of the level of detail. I now want to collect all of these sets.
customer_reviews.author: SciFiChick

customer_reviews.title: Nice set - great for a Star Trek fan
customer_reviews.text: I should start this by acknowledging that I am a huge Star Trek fan, so I was very excited to receive this set.It's been fun to look at and I haven't started putting it together, but the pieces good great and I like the attention to detail with the monitor screens. However, I am a little disappointed with the figures; they have odd proportions and the painting isn't very good on their faces. But, still this is nice for real Star Trek fan.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Rosenthal

customer_reviews.title: Great set but make sure to buy the add ons too
customer_reviews.text: The set is a fun build. Holds together well. Looks great. Lots of playability for the figures. Some people buy multiple sets to make a full round bridge but I like it the way it is. Do buy the day of the dove and guardian of forever sets as well. That way you get the full bridge crew plus some red shirts and klingons.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Whether you're an adult or kid, fun kit to build for display or play
customer_reviews.text: Whether you just want to construct it for display or you're a kid and actually want to play with it, the Mega Bloks Start Trek U.S.S. Enterprise bridge from the Original Series is fun for both adult fanboys and kids. Easy to construct with clear directions, it includes four action figures that are more detailed (if displaying) and articulated (if playing or trying stop motion animation) than other building sets
customer_reviews.author: Todd Post

customer_reviews.title: A blast to put together and it looks fantastic, most mega blocks sets I had as a ...
customer_reviews.text: Got it on sale for 30 bucks during a lightning deal, what a steal. A blast to put together and it looks fantastic, most mega blocks sets I had as a kid were such poor quality, but they've obvious stepped up their game. If you're a lego and Star Trek TOS fan this is a must buy. Sucks it's 60 bucks again though
customer_reviews.author: Joe Lord

customer_reviews.title: People always ask where they can buy this
customer_reviews.text: Everyone who sees this loves it! The action figures are a hoot. Perfect for the Start Trek lover.
customer_reviews.author: D. Corbishley

product_meta.title: Mega Bloks Star Trek U.S.S. Enterprise Bridge Collector Construction Set
product_meta.description: Starfleet's finest stand at the ready on the U.S.S. Enterprise Bridge collector construction set by Mega Bloks Star Trek! Recreate your favorite moments when you build this classic bridge, and pose iconic characters like Kirk, Spock, Uhura, and Sulu at their stations in the ship's command center. Inspired by Star Trek: The Original Series, this detailed set features a helm console, computer stations with view screens, turbo lift doors that open, and a swiveling captain's chair. Open up the hinged sections, or illuminate the view screens from behind for a dynamic display. The four highly detailed, super-pose able micro action figures each come with their own signature uniform and an authentic accessory. Ideal for ages 14 years and older.
feature_bullets: Buildable USS Enterprise Bridge with helm console, computer stations, view screens, opening turbo lift doors, and swiveling captain's chair
Four highly detailed, super-pose able micro action figures, including Kirk, Spock, Uhura, and Sulu
Authentic accessories include phasers, tricorder, and communicator
Open the hinged wall sections and illuminate the view screens for dynamic display
Collect and combine with other Mega Bloks Star Trek sets and build the voyage

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars108 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
